import React, {useState} from 'react' import stickersData from './AuctionStikers-data' function Sticker(props){ const index = props.index const onClick = props.onClick const stickersDataIndex = stickersData[index] return(
{stickersDataIndex.profile.nickname}
{stickersDataIndex.stickname}
) } export default Sticker
